definition: "honker", Chinese hacker motivated by patriotism, using one's skills to protect domestic networks and work in national interest

sentences.english: There are tens of thousands of Hong Ke, or red visitors, as they are known in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，這些數以萬計黑客們被稱爲“紅客”。

sentences.english: White Hat hackers are the unsung heroes of the Information Age.
sentences.chinese: 紅客是信息時代的無名英雄。

sentences.english: One of his cheeks had been hacked off and hung down.
sentences.chinese: 他的臉頰被一砍而紅客下來。
